title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
steps: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Beat the eggs with grated Pecorino cheese and pepper.
Drain spaghetti and mix quickly with pancetta and egg mixture.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala spice for 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry the chicken until cooked.
Add cooked chicken and cream, then simmer for 10 minutes.
